feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
